definition: jasper/fine jade/beautiful/exquisite (e.g. wine, food)/abbr. for Hainan province
Yao ethnic group of southwest China and southeast Asia/surname Yao

sentences.english: She likes reading Qiongyao written novels.
sentences.chinese: 她喜歡看瓊瑤寫的小說。

sentences.english: Traminette - A Gewurztraminer hybrid from the Geneva Breeding Program.
sentences.chinese: 從日內瓦育種計劃瓊瑤漿混合。

sentences.english: He goes bananas about the novels by Qiongyao.
sentences.chinese: 瓊瑤的小說讓他迷到發狂的程度。

sentences.english: Even when dry, Gewurztraminer should never taste too acidic!
sentences.chinese: 即使是幹葡萄酒，瓊瑤漿的酸度也不會很高。

sentences.english: Qiongyao said that her stories are fictional with true sentiments .
sentences.chinese: 瓊瑤說她的故事都是富有真感情的。

sentences.english: Romantic fiction written by Qiongyao influence many people.
sentences.chinese: 瓊瑤的言情小說影響了好多人。

definition: currently popular (of movie stars, singers etc)
jasper/fine jade/beautiful/exquisite (e.g. wine, food)/abbr. for Hainan province
dawn/daybreak/to know/to let sb know/to make explicit
to have a special fondness (for sth)
to be popular/to be in luck/to have good luck/to develop smoothly
